en.faq.title: FAQ ‚Äì Whiteout Survival (SVS, Bear Trap, Transfers)
en.faq.q1: Is WOSC an official Whiteout Survival Discord?
en.faq.a1: No. WOSC is a community-run Discord built by players for strategy, event planning and fast help.
en.faq.q2: What is SVS (State vs State / State of Power)?
en.faq.a2: SVS is a state-vs-state competition with phases such as matchmaking, preparation and battle. Planning what to save is key.
en.faq.q3: How does Bear Trap / Bear Hunt work?
en.faq.a3: It‚Äôs an alliance event focused on coordinated rallies and consistent damage. Better timing and roles usually means better rewards.
en.faq.a4: A timed event where you collect Orichalcum by holding veins. Many guides note troops aren‚Äôt permanently lost inside the mine, so rotations matter.
en.faq.a5: State Transfer lets you move to another state during the event window, but rules apply (state age limits, hero generation, transfer limits).
en.faq.q6: How do I join the Discord quickly?
en.faq.a6: Click JOIN DISCORD, say hi in #welcome, pick your language, then use #quick-index to jump to the right section.
en.seoBlock.title: Whiteout Survival Strategy Hub ‚Äì what you‚Äôll find here
en.seoBlock.p1: This site is the front door to our Discord: a structured Whiteout Survival community with guides for SVS, Bear Trap, Frostfire Mine and State Transfers. If you‚Äôre tired of chaotic chats and missing event timing, you‚Äôre in the right place.
en.seoBlock.p2: Inside the server you‚Äôll get clean onboarding, a quick-index, dedicated event hubs, and multi-language channels. We focus on practical planning: what to save, what to do on event days, and how to coordinate as an alliance/state.
en.seoBlock.p3: If you want help with hero progression, event rotations, and transfer preparation, join the Discord and use the guide sections linked above.

ar.faq.a2: SVS is a state-vs-state competition with phases such as matchmaking, preparation and battle. Planning what to save is key.

nl.faq.a1: No. WOSC is a community-run Discord built by players for strategy, event planning and fast help.
nl.faq.a2: SVS is a state-vs-state competition with phases such as matchmaking, preparation and battle. Planning what to save is key.
nl.faq.a3: It‚Äôs an alliance event focused on coordinated rallies and consistent damage. Better timing and roles usually means better rewards.
nl.faq.a4: A timed event where you collect Orichalcum by holding veins. Many guides note troops aren‚Äôt permanently lost inside the mine, so rotations matter.
nl.faq.a5: State Transfer lets you move to another state during the event window, but rules apply (state age limits, hero generation, transfer limits).

nl.seoBlock.p1: This site is the front door to our Discord: a structured Whiteout Survival community with guides for SVS, Bear Trap, Frostfire Mine and State Transfers. If you‚Äôre tired of chaotic chats and missing event timing, you‚Äôre in the right place.
nl.seoBlock.p2: Inside the server you‚Äôll get clean onboarding, a quick-index, dedicated event hubs, and multi-language channels. We focus on practical planning: what to save, what to do on event days, and how to coordinate as an alliance/state.
nl.seoBlock.p3: If you want help with hero progression, event rotations, and transfer preparation, join the Discord and use the guide sections linked above.
